info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 4:00PM MST until July 27 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST/530 PM PDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 400 PM MST /400 PM PDT/, The heavy rain has ended across the warned area. However, with relatively widespread rainfall estimates of 1 to 2 inches and locally over 2 inches, flooded road concerns remain. HAZARD...Flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations included in the warning include... Pierce Ferry, Stockton Hill, and Antares Roads, Dolan Springs, Temple Bar Campground and Temple Bar Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
